title: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions              Current Conditions          Alerts    Caution        Wildland Fire Update (8/1)  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Wildland Fire Update (8/1)  The fire on Lookout Mountain is 100% controlled and all trails, & all trails are open. Do not venture off trail, and if you see or smell smoke call 911 or the park at 706-866-9241.     Information        Red Trail Closures at Chickamauga Battlefield  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Red Trail Closures at Chickamauga Battlefield  The National Park Service is advising the beginning of repair work on a 1.09 mile section of the Red Trail located in the northwest corner of the Chickamauga Battlefield. This section is part of the equestrian trail that intersects the yellow trail.
